text: I usually stay away from mcdonalds and when I do, I stay away from the fries and just get the big mac. Every mcdonalds is pretty consistant but when I ate here, the bread was hard, the burger was messy, and one of the worst big mac I've ate. It's right near my school so I go here but not very good.

What can I say, its fast food. I was having a Big Mac attack @ 2 in the morning & this was the only McDonald's nearby that was open. I've been here a bunch of times but rarely check in, which is the case with most fast food places if & when I visit. Never been inside here, strictly drive-thru. The service is very good & the staff is always polite. Yes, I will definitely be back the next time I'm craving a Big Mac & delicious sweet tea or whenever the Mcrib is in town or during March for the shamrock shake ;b
The best Mickey Ds ever.  Kool Workers there too.  Good pies over there. The best in Vegas..............

Restaurant is fully armed and operational. The play place is still under construction as of March 7 2011.
The remodel looks very nice.

This place has the worst service hands down. I mean I have no expectations really for fast food, in fact my only expectation is shitty service but this place goes beyond bad. In addition the playarea is always disgusting. I saw a kid puke on the floor and they put up the yellow wet floor signs and went back to the cash register. Other times like today a table looked like a vegas buffet tornado had touched down scattering fries and chunks of burger everywhere. Hey yah know what pick up after your kids people, two minutes thats all and make your hellions help. But still even though the parents shoulda cleaned up, god knows how long its been sitting there trashed. The syrup was out on EVERYTHING, no joke! I told the manager and he did nothing. But he did refell my cup from the drive through machine.
I got uncooked raw chicken and the manager tried to prove to me it was cooked. Nasty  nasty  nasty
I'm here now and the manager Robert is amazing!   It's jam packed and he's on it!  Great experience today!

Stopped at this McDonald's this morning for breakfast.  Walked into a scene that a handicapped man was claiming to have been mistreated by an employee.  The man was demanding they call the police.  The crew behind the counter were acting as if he wasn't even there.  The manager never came out to handle the situation. Every person needs to be treated like a human. This McDonald's crew choose to act as if this man was invisible.  The man kept on telling them to say something, stop acting like he's invisible.  This is a very sad and pathetic attitude demonstrated by this McDonald's.  Shame on the crew and the manager.
Slowest service ever! It took them about 10 minutes and I finally get my food. Last time I went to McDonald's it took them less than a minute.

Close to home so I go here. Ice cream machine is always down. It worked today but no one seemed to care that my order was incomplete. I patiently waited for 10 minutes or more for my order and another 5 for the ice cream they forgot to give me for my kid. One thing is waiting because it's busy another is poor customer service. I asked the lady told who gave me my food for the ice cream and she told the cashier to give it to me and the girl never addressed me. So I walked out, couldn't wait any longer.
Terrible service . If the employees there are getting minimum wage they are being over paid never seen such incompetence
Horrible customer service at this McDonald's .... Drive thru takes a long time and you can't understand anybody... I do NOT recommend going to this McDonald's
Clean restroom and quick delicious food at cheap prices, why not stop by here for a sweet tea or ice cream?
When I'm too lazy to drive over the Craig location, I go to this one. I've only used the drive thru, it was quick, efficient, polite and has yet to get my order wrong.
Trash gave it a second chance trash again  lmao literally always trash might as well get the burger out of their trash cause that's obviously be where their supply is located

It never ceases to amaze me how often McDonald's gets an order wrong. You place your order, it gets input into the system and displayed on a screen. ALL THEY HAVE TO DO IS LOOKING AT THE SCREEN! I got coffee today, they actually have pretty good coffee. You tell them how many creams and how many sugars and it gets printed on a label and stuck on the cup...cream...check, sugar...NO SUGAR. I ordered 3, got zero. Come on people!

There are two things that make this place above average. The first is the play place. It is big and spacious but the netting makes it easy to spot kids without having to scale the thing. There is a toddler area with a separate entrance. I have toddlers and a lot of these places just have a few climbing toys at the foot of the stairs which means a lot of chances for your kid to get stepped on by bigger kids. 
The second thing, is the staff. Specifically, Meylissa. There are two kinds of fast food employees in my experience, the kind that hand you single ketchup packets and individual napkins like they have to pay for them out of pocket, and the kind that give you extra napkins because you have kids with you.  She also brought outer tray into the play area, which is really helpful when you don't want to leave your kids to grab their food.
Our large order of fries was half empty!!  Drive through lady sucked! Came at 3:50am on Friday night 6/16...paid for a medium fries?you suck drive thru lady

I rarely stop by this Mickey D's, but did because the Kid and his friend wanted a snack on the way back home....so we stopped here so they could satisfy their Big Mac Attack.

Food was fast, order was accurate, kids were happy = pops happy.

3 Stars.

Return Factor - 35%

On a hot day we need some Oreo McFlurry's!  Always get wonderful friendly service. Food is always good, not like its been sitting around forever. A playground here too for the kids!  Southwest Chicken Salad is great!
The sweet tea here is THE best and even at 3 am when I run through the drive thru the fries are hot & fresh. Never thought I'd write a yelp review about McDonald's but yo y'all deserve it. Good stuff

It was only a couple minutes after 11 and I ordered 5 breakfast meals and they told me that they don't serve hashbrowns after 11. The girl checking me out was pretty snotty when I asked if others did that and didn't seem helpful.

Had my car at Meineke's next door and 45 minutes to kill.  Just after 10:30am and I tried to get the least expensive breakfast thingy off the dollar menu.  they had closed down breakfast and wouldn't give me a mcbiscuit or whatever they call it.  Made me feel like they didn't care if I ate there or not.  

Walked across the street to the Jack in the Box and bought a breakfast whatever.  Great service and no hassle.  Lots of breakfast items on the menu.  Place was clean too.
Not a fan of any fast food but when ever I come here they are very nice, accurate and quick. I drive past the Md's near me to go this one lol.

My favorite McDonalds. I have been to a gazillion ones but I always keep comparing them to my home Mcdonalds. 

This is the location where they are consistently friendly and the COOKIES are always warm and freshly baked! 

Plus now they offer CRISPY CHICKEN WINGS and it's so good! I grew up in the Philippines where they would offer chicken and rice combos and I would miss it. So yay! They would also sometimes offer free samples like apple pie. Awesome!

I went here this morning to get my son some pancakes or "hotcakes". Ordered a big breakfast platter but I didn't get any hotcakes..? They were busy sure, but I'm sure it's that way every morning. Even still they made sure I had everything just not my hotcakes.. came home to realize we had none for my little one. Oh well, that's McDonald's for you. 5/10 my order is wrong no matter the location.

There is no hope for McDs and Ray Kroc is rolling in his grave. Came in with kids. Counter staff clueless and fighting with customers. Mob scene of 20 ghetto kids in seating area just looking to rob people screaming foul language and fighting. Oh and the food sux.

I ordered 2 Quarter Pounder one with mac sauce and the Other Regular but I got with just cheese 
I guess she doesn't know the difference between Regular & Plain . Good job

avoid this location at all costs. the staff claim to only have a spicy McCHICKIN but no regular ones. aside from this the employees are absolute horrible i brought a receipt from a previous order with a voucher for a buy one get one free sandwich and the girl at the window would literally not give me my voucher back she tried feeding me some bs about how its illegible because of their broken printer. AVOID THIS LOCATION GO TO ANY OTHER MCDONALDS I PROMISE YOUR EXPERIENCE WILL BE BETTER

Definitely not here for the service or cleanliness. Waited to order 5 employees looked at me and kept on what they were doing. No acknowledgement. I know I know it's "McDonald's!!"  Yea rich ass corporation. They need to put money into training in customer service. Oh wait these are some of the people that are protesting for$15 an hour. Smh
